contribution_desc: A multi-device device framework that allows for a series of cross-device interactions such as chaining tasks across devices or distributing user interfaces elements across them. Conductor was evaluated in a qualitative user study using a sensemaking task (i.e. the VAST 2006 challenge/contest).
interaction_techniques: Data transfer/sharing; Visualisation; UI distribution; Cross-device task chaining
contribution: Interaction techniques; Study, deployment; Use-case, application
crossdevice_def: Cross-device application experiences are often broadly categorized as Distributed User Interfaces (DUI's). For instance, media experiences for tablets and phones which augment on-TV content, and documents which can be edited synchronously on any device.
